item.name: Time the request being processed at the leader Fetch-Consumer
Time the request being processed at the leader Fetch-Follower
Time the request being processed at the leader Produce
Time the request waits for the follower Fetch-Consumer
Time the request waits for the follower Fetch-Follower
Time the request waits for the follower Produce
Time the request waiting in the request queue Fetch-Consumer
Time the request waiting in the request queue Fetch-Follower
Time the request waiting in the request queue Produce
Time the request waits in the response queue FetchConsumer
Time the request waits in the response queue FetchFollower
Time the request waits in the response queue Produce
Time to send the response Fetch-Consumer
Time to send the response Fetch-Follower
Time to send the response Produce
Temporary memory size in bytes Fetch Max
Temporary memory size in bytes Fetch Mean
Temporary memory size in bytes Fetch Min
Temporary memory size in bytes Produce Max
Temporary memory size in bytes Produce Mean
Temporary memory size in bytes Produce Min
The total number of connections disconnected, across all processors, due to a client not re-authenticating
item.description: The total number of connections disconnected, across all processors, due to a client not re-authenticating and then using the connection beyond its expiration time for anything other than re-authentication

item.name: The average fraction of time the network processors are idle
Requests waiting in the fetch purgatory
Requests waiting in the producer purgatory
Avg time to load group metadata
item.description: average time, in milliseconds, it took to load offsets and group metadata from the consumer offset partitions loaded in the last 30 seconds

item.name: Max time to load group metadata
item.description: maximum time, in milliseconds, it took to load offsets and group metadata from the consumer offset partitions loaded in the last 30 seconds

item.name: Max lag in messages btw follower and leader replicas
# of at minIsr partitions (|ISR| = min.insync.replicas)
item.description: Information on the management interface of the MBean

item.name: Number of reassigning partitions
item.description: The number of reassigning leader partitions on a broker.

item.name: Avg time to load transaction metadata
item.description: average time, in milliseconds, it took to load transaction metadata from the consumer offset partitions loaded in the last 30 seconds

item.name: Max time to load transaction metadata
item.description: maximum time, in milliseconds, it took to load transaction metadata from the consumer offset partitions loaded in the last 30 seconds

item.name: ZooKeeper client request latency
item.description: Latency in millseconds for ZooKeeper requests from broker.

discovery_rule.name: ZooKeeper connection status
discovery_rule.description: Connection status of broker's ZooKeeper session which may be one of Disconnected|SyncConnected|AuthFailed|ConnectedReadOnly|SaslAuthenticated|Expired.
